variable.name: C01DIFF
variable.description: Difference (days) between EDC by LMP vs Ultrasound

variable.name: C01OTHER
variable.description: Is the participant participating in any other study or clinical trial?

variable.name: C01OTHERYES
variable.description: If yes for C01OTHER, name of study:

variable.name: C01INCGA
variable.description: Delivery between 20 wks 0 days and 33 wks 6 days (inclusive) following spontaneous onset of labour and/or pPROM that is followed at any interval by the spontaneous onset of labour at < 34 weeks gestation

variable.name: C01INCGA2
variable.description: Gestational age at delivery estimated by and meeting criteria of Project gestational age

variable.name: C01XIND
variable.description: Indicated delivery (for maternal or fetal indication)

variable.name: C01XPOLY
variable.description: Polyhydramnios (defined as Amniotic Fluid Index >/=25 cm or Deepest vertical Pocket >/=12 cm)

variable.name: C01XPPROM
variable.description: PPROM that occurs at less than 34 weeks 0 days that is NOT followed by spontaneous labour?

variable.name: C01INCGA3
variable.description: Delivery between 39 wks 0 days and 41 wks 6 days following spontaneous labour and/or PROM (see definition 255) that is followed at any interval by the spontaneous onset of labour between 39 wks 0 days and 41 wks 6 days

variable.name: C01INCGA4
variable.description: Gestational age at delivery estimated by and meeting criteria of Project gestational age

variable.name: C01XIND2
variable.description: Indicated delivery (for medical or obstetrical complications not related to preterm labor)

variable.name: C01XANEU2
variable.description: Known aneuploidy or lethal fetal anomalies

variable.name: C01XPOLY2
variable.description: Polyhydramnios (defined as Amniotic Fluid Index >=25 cm or Deepest Vertical Pocket >=12 cm)

variable.name: C01XPROM
variable.description: PROM that is not followed by the spontaneous onset of labour?

variable.name: C01PARTIC
variable.description: Willing to participate in the study?

variable.name: C02TIME
variable.description: What time of day does the patient usually work?

variable.name: C02OTHINS
variable.description: If other for C02INSU, please specify

variable.name: C02PRECARE
variable.description: Did the patient obtain prenatal care during this pregnancy?

variable.name: C02PROVIDE
variable.description: If yes for C02PRECARE, primary provider?

variable.name: C02ARTPREG
variable.description: Is the current pregnancy the result of assisted reproductive technology (ART)?

variable.name: C02TYPEART
variable.description: If yes for C02ARTPREG, type of ART?

variable.name: C02OTHART
variable.description: If other for C02TYPEART, specify type of ART

variable.name: C02WTLOSS
variable.description: Was the patient attempting to lose weight at the time she became pregnant?

variable.name: C02WTGAIN
variable.description: Was the patient trying to gain weight when she became pregnant?

variable.name: C02WTLOSS2
variable.description: Did she lose weight in the 3 months prior to becoming pregnant?

variable.name: C02WTLOSS3
variable.description: If yes, how much weight lost (lbs)?

variable.name: C02DIET
variable.description: Was the patient following a special diet at the time she became pregnant?

variable.name: C02DIET2
variable.description: If yes for C02DIET, what diet?

variable.name: C02DIET3
variable.description: If other for C02DIET2, specify diet

variable.name: C03SMEVER
variable.description: Has the patient ever smoked cigarettes?

variable.name: C03SMPREG
variable.description: Has the patient smoked cigarettes at any time during this pregnancy?

variable.name: C03NUMCIG
variable.description: If yes for C03CURSM, number of cigarettes per day in the last week?

variable.name: C03ALEVER
variable.description: Has the patient ever consumed an alcoholic drink?

variable.name: C03ALPREG
variable.description: Has the patient consumed alcoholic drinks at any time during this pregnancy?

variable.name: C03ALCUR
variable.description: Does the patient currently drink alcohol?

variable.name: C03ALWK
variable.description: If yes for C03ALCUR, number of drinks in the last week?

variable.name: C03MORE4
variable.description: During this pregnancy, how many times in one month has the patient consumed 4 or more drinks in one episode?

variable.name: C03DRUGEV
variable.description: Has the patient ever used street drugs?

variable.name: C03DRGPREG
variable.description: Has the patient ever used street drugs at any time during this pregnancy?

variable.name: C03DRGUSE
variable.description: Time of drug use (Multiple drugs are split by "|")

variable.name: C03DRGNM
variable.description: Drug name (Multiple drugs are split by "|")

variable.name: C03DRGNMOT
variable.description: If other for C03DRGNM, please specify drug (Multiple drugs are split by "|")

variable.name: C03DRGWKUSE
variable.description: Number of times drug used /week? (Multiple drugs are split by "|")

variable.name: C04DIABETES
variable.value: A1: gestational diabetes, insulin not required
B: age of onset >=20 years (maturity onset diabetes)
C: age of onset 10-19 yrs of age
D: age of onset < 10 yrs of age or duration >= 20 years

variable.name: C04MOMPTB
variable.description: Has the patient's mother experienced a preterm birth?

variable.name: C04SISTERS
variable.description: Does the patient have any sisters?

variable.name: C04SISPTB
variable.description: Have any of the sisters experienced a preterm birth?

variable.name: C04COUSIN
variable.description: Does the patient have any female first cousins?

variable.name: C04COUSPTB
variable.description: Have any of the first cousins experienced a preterm birth?

variable.name: C05PRENATV2
variable.description: If yes for C05PRENATV, did prenatal vitamin use begin before the current pregnancy?

variable.name: C05FOLIC
variable.description: Is the patient currently taking folic acid supplements?

variable.name: C05CORT
variable.description: Has the patient used corticosteroids at any time during pregnancy (other than for acceleration of functional fetal maturity)?

variable.name: C05PROGEST
variable.description: Has the patient used Progesterone therapy prior to 14 weeks?

variable.name: C05NEWMED
variable.description: Has the patient been prescribed any new medications since the patient's last study visit?

variable.name: C05BRAND
variable.description: Brand or Generic Name of Drug (Multiple drugs are split by "|")

variable.name: C05GENER
variable.description: Medication (Generic name) (Multiple drugs are split by "|")

variable.name: C05DOSE
variable.description: Dose of the medication (Multiple drugs are split by "|")

variable.name: C05FREQ2
variable.description: Frequency of the medication (Multiple drugs are split by "|")
variable.value: Other (free text in next field to describe 'other' frequency)

variable.name: C05FREQ1_20
variable.description: Other Frequency if C05FREQ2 is 8 (Other) (Multiple drugs are split by "|")

variable.name: C05REAS1_20
variable.description: Reason for taking the medication (Multiple drugs are split by "|")

variable.name: C08BABYMV
variable.description: In the last 24 hours, how does the patient describe the movement of her baby?

variable.name: C08PTL
variable.description: Has the patient ever been evaluated for symptoms of PRETERM LABOR in the hospital or in the doctor's office during this pregnancy?

variable.name: C08PROMEVAL
variable.description: Has the patient ever been evaluated for symptoms of PROM in the hospital or in the doctor's office during this pregnancy?

variable.name: C08HOSPREAS
variable.description: What was the primary reason(s) that the patient came to the hospital? (multiple reasons are split by "|")
variable.value: Leakage of fluid from the vagina

variable.name: C08HOSPREAS2
variable.description: Please specify other primary reason that the patient came to the hospital:

variable.name: C08NUMCONT
variable.description: In the past 2 weeks, how often has the patient experienced uterine contractions >/=6 contractions per hour?

variable.name: C08EADMIT
variable.description: Has the patient ever been admitted to the hospital during this pregnancy prior to this admission?

variable.name: C08ADMITREAS1
variable.description: If yes for C08EADMIT, choose reasons for previous admission (multiple reasons are split by "|")

variable.name: C08ADMITREAS2
variable.description: Please specify other reason for admission, if C08ADMITREAS1 is other

variable.name: C08COMP1
variable.description: Has the patient ever experienced any complications during this pregnancy?

variable.name: C08COMP2
variable.description: If yes for C08COMP1, choose complications experienced (multiple complications are split by "|")

variable.name: C08COMP3
variable.description: Please specify other complications experienced, if C08COMP2 is other

variable.name: C08NEWMED1
variable.description: Has the patient been prescribed any new medications?

variable.name: C08CVMSUS
variable.description: Has the patient's cervix ever been measured by ultrasound?

variable.name: C08DIGIT
variable.description: Has the patient had a digital cervical exam?

variable.name: C08DILATE
variable.description: Result of digital cervical exam: cm dilated:

variable.name: C08EFFACE
variable.description: Result of digital cervical exam: Effacement %

variable.name: C08VFF
variable.description: Has the patient had a vaginal fetal fibronectin sample collected?

variable.name: C08MORE4CON
variable.description: More than 4 contractions in 20 minute period?

variable.name: C09DELCLASS1
variable.value: PROM leading to spontaneous preterm delivery

variable.name: PRETERMCESAR
variable.description: Reason for preterm fetal or maternal complications (If multiple, split by "|")

variable.name: C09STILLOUT
variable.description: If the infant is not live born, code infant outcome
variable.value: Immediate neonatal death or hospice care in delivery room

variable.name: C09CCROIDS1
variable.description: Corticosteroids used at any time during this pregnancy?

variable.name: C09CCROIDS2
variable.description: Specify which corticosteroid was used and the dose

variable.name: C09TOCO1
variable.description: Tocolytics used at any time during this hospitalization for delivery?

variable.name: C09TOCO2
variable.description: If yes for C09TOCO1, choose tocolytics used from the list below (if multiple, split by "|")

variable.name: C09ABX1
variable.description: Antibiotics used at any time during this hospitalization for delivery?

variable.name: C09ABX2
variable.description: If Yes for C09ABX1, choose which kind used

variable.name: C09ABX3
variable.description: Specify what other antibiotics were used

variable.name: C09HTNMED1
variable.description: Antihypertensives used at any time during this hospitalization for delivery?

variable.name: C09HTNMED2
variable.description: If Yes for C09HTNMED1, choose which kind used

variable.name: C09HTNMED3
variable.description: Specify what other antihypertensives were used

variable.name: C09ANTICON1
variable.description: Anticonvulsants used at any time during this hospitalization for delivery?

variable.name: C09ANTICON2
variable.description: If Yes for C09ANTICON1, choose which kind used

variable.name: C09NARC1
variable.description: Narcotics or analgesics used at any time during this hospitalization for delivery?

variable.name: C09NARC2
variable.description: If yes for C09NARC1, choose which kind used (if multiple, split by "|")

variable.name: C09NARC3
variable.description: Specify what other narcotics or analgesics were used

variable.name: C09POSTCOMP1
variable.description: Post Partum Complications? (if multiple, split by "|")

variable.name: C09POSTCOMP2
variable.description: If yes for C09POSTCOMP1, which complications

variable.name: C09OTHSTUDY1
variable.description: Was patient enrolled in any other studies during this pregnancy?

variable.name: C09OTHSTUDY2
variable.description: If yes for C09OTHSTUDY1, specify study(ies)

variable.name: C10NEODTH1
variable.description: Did infant experience immediate neonatal death?

variable.name: C10NEODTH2
variable.description: What was the cause of neonatal death?

variable.name: C10PEDGA
variable.description: Pediatric assessment of Gestational Age at delivery (wks)

variable.name: C10NEOCOMP2
variable.description: Possible neonatal complications (if multiple, split by "|")
variable.value: Chronic Lung Disease (O2 at 36 wks adjusted)
Patent ductus arteriosus requiring medical/surgical treatment

variable.name: C10NEOCOMP3
variable.description: If Other Neonatal Complications, please describe

variable.name: C10CRANICT
variable.description: Was a cranial sonogram or CT performed during this hospitalization?

variable.name: C10IVH
variable.description: If yes to cranial sonogram or CT, most severe grade IVH:

variable.name: C10TRANS1
variable.description: Transferred from birth hospital NICU (if sent to chronic care choose 'NO')

variable.name: C10TRANS2
variable.description: Specify where baby was transferred to
variable.value: Transferred to another hospital, non NICU

variable.name: C10ABNORM
variable.description: Were there any Congenital or Chromosomal abnormalities?

variable.name: C11UPSET
variable.description: Part I: Been upset because of something that happened unexpectedly?

variable.name: C11CONTROL
variable.description: Part I: Felt that you were unable to control the important things in your life?

variable.name: C11CONF
variable.description: Part I: Felt confident about your ability to handle your personal problems?

variable.name: C11URWAY
variable.description: Part I: Felt that things were going your way?

variable.name: C11COPE
variable.description: Part I: Found that you could not cope with all the things that you had to do?

variable.name: C11IRRA
variable.description: Part I: Been able to control irritations in your life?

variable.name: C11TOP
variable.description: Part I: Felt that you were on top of things?

variable.name: C11ANGER
variable.description: Part I: Been angered because of things that were outside your control?

variable.name: C11DIFF
variable.description: Part I: Felt difficulties were piling up so high that you could not overcome them?

variable.name: C11FEAR
variable.description: Part II: Fear of worst happening

variable.name: C11HEART
variable.description: Part II: Heart pounding or racing

variable.name: C11CTRL
variable.description: Part II: Fear of losing control

variable.name: C11SWEAT
variable.description: Part II: Hot or cold sweats

variable.name: C11SAD
variable.value: I am sad all the time and I can't snap out of it
I am so sad or unhappy that I can't stand it

variable.name: C11DISCOU
variable.value: I am not particularly discouraged about the future
I feel discouraged about the future
I feel I have nothing to look forward to
I feel that the future is hopeless and that things cannot improve

variable.name: C11FAIL
variable.value: I do not feel like a failure
I feel I have failed more than the average person
As I look back on my life, all I can see is a lot of failures
I feel I am a complete failure as a person

variable.name: C11SATIS
variable.value: I get as much satisfaction out of things as I used to
I don't enjoy things the way I used to
I don't get real satisfaction out of things anymore
I am dissatisfied or bored with everything

variable.name: C11GUILT
variable.value: I feel guilty a good part of the time
I feel guilty most of the time
I feel guilty all of the time

variable.name: C11PUNISH
variable.value: I don't feel I am being punished
I feel I may be punished
I feel I am being punished

variable.name: C11DISAP
variable.value: I don't feel disappointed in myself

variable.name: C11BLAME
variable.value: I don't feel I am worse than anybody else
I am critical of myself for my weaknesses or mistakes
I blame myself all the time for my faults
I blame myself for everything bad that happens

variable.name: C11KILLSELF
variable.value: I don't have any thoughts of killing myself
I have thoughts of killing myself, but I would not carry them out
I would like to kill myself
I would kill myself if I had the chance

variable.name: C11CRY
variable.value: I don't cry any more than usual
I cry more now than I used to
I cry all the time now
I used to be able to cry but now I can't even though I want to

variable.name: C11IRRITATE
variable.value: I am no more irritated by things than I ever am
I am slightly more irritated now than usual
I am quite annoyed or irritated a good deal of the time
I feel irritated all the time now

variable.name: C11INTEREST
variable.value: I have not lost interest in other people
I am less interested in other people than I used to be
I have lost most of my interest in other people
I have lost all my interest in other people

variable.name: C11DECIDE
variable.value: I make decisions as well as I ever could
I put off making decisions more than I used to
I have greater difficulty making decisions than before
I can't make decisions at all anymore

variable.name: C11UNATTR
variable.value: I don't feel I look any worse than I used to
I am worried that I am looking old or unattractive
I feel that there are permanent changes in my appearance that make me look unattractive
I believe that I look ugly

variable.name: C11WORK
variable.value: I can work about as well as before
It takes an extra effort to get started at doing something
I have to push myself very hard to do anything
I can't do any work at all

variable.name: C11SLEEP
variable.value: I can sleep as well as usual
I don't sleep as well as I used to
I wake 1-2 hours earlier than usual and find it hard to go back to sleep
I wake up several hours earlier than I used to and cannot go back to sleep

variable.name: C11TIRED
variable.value: I don't get more tired than usual
I get tired more easily than I used to
I get tired from doing almost anything
I am too tired to do anything

variable.name: C11APPET
variable.value: My appetite is no worse than usual
My appetite is not as good as it used to be
My appetite is much worse now
I have no appetite at all anymore

variable.name: C11LSWT
variable.description: Part III: 19a. I am purposely trying to lose weight

variable.name: C11LSTWT
variable.value: I haven't lost much weight if any lately
I have lost more than 5 lbs
I have lost more than 10 lbs
I have lost more than 15 lbs

variable.name: C11WORRY
variable.value: I am no more worried about my health than usual
I am worried about physical problems such as aches pains or upset stomach or constipation
I am very worried about physical problems and it is hard to think of much else
I am so worried about my physical problems that I cannot think about anything else

variable.name: C11SEX
variable.value: I have not noticed any recent changes in my interest in sex
I am less interested in sex than I used to be
I am much less interested in sex now
I have lost interest in sex completely

variable.name: C11BFPREG
variable.description: Part IV: Thinking back, just before you became pregnant, which of the following best describes how you were feeling at the time?
variable.value: I wanted this pregnancy at an earlier time, as well as that time
I wanted to become pregnant at that time
I did not want to become pregnant at that time, but wanted a child sometime in the future
I did not want to become pregnant at that time, or at any time in the future

variable.name: C11PARTNER
variable.description: Part IV: Which of the following statements best describes your partner during the three months before you became pregnant?
variable.value: He wanted very much for me to get pregnant
He wanted me to get pregnant
He partly wanted me to get pregnant and partly wanted me not to get pregnant
He didn't care one way or another whether I got pregnant
He did not especially want me to get pregnant

variable.name: C14OTHER
variable.description: Other Unanticipated SERIOUS Adverse Event (provide brief explanation below)

variable.name: C14RELATE
variable.description: RELATIONSHIP OF ADVERSE EVENT TO STUDY: (CHECK ONE)
